item.title: Eclipse 2d MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Its a very poor engine, that should be re-done in a better language. It also depends on what engine you use, Stable is the most common one seen (and the one i first used, for like a week before I noticed how dumb it was), this engine is very limited as to how it is coded. It provides nearly no dynamic additions to everything, as you need to position EVERYTHING down to the exact pixel on the same sheet. I would suggest writing your own game-engine before using this engine.

Read full topic
